mapper.sql: PROJECT_ID, INVEST_ID, OLD_PROJECT_ID, ORIGINAL_PROJECT_ID, DEADLINE, RULE_ID, REALIZE_AMOUNT, REALIZE_INTEREST

if.test: page != null and page.sort!=null and page.sort!=''

mapper.update: update realize set delete_flag = 1 where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: select p.uuid,p.user_id,p.project_no,p.project_name,p.raise_account,p.account,p.account_yes,p.apr,p.add_apr,p.interest_style,p.interest_start_days, p.repay_style,p.fixed_repay_day,p.time_type,p.time_limit,p.create_time,p.publish_verify_time,p.update_time,p.show_time,p.stop_time,p.sale_time, p.vouch_verify_time,p.raise_time_limit,p.raise_end_time,p.review_time,p.borrow_manage_rate,p.interest_manage_rate,p.overdue_fee_rate,p.novice,p.choice, p.sale_style,p.lowest_account,p.most_account,p.step_account,p.total_copies,p.copy_account,p.lowest_copies,p.most_copies,p.risk_level,p.red_envelope_useful, p.red_envelope_rate,p.additional_rate_useful,p.project_type_id,p.status,p.is_vouch,p.vouch_id,p.vouch_status,p.interest_time,p.borrow_flag,p.realize_flag, p.sale_channel,p.specific_sale,p.specific_sale_rule,p.repay_amount,p.repay_yes_account,p.repay_yes_interest,p.total_period,p.repayed_period,p.next_repay_time, p.last_repay_time,p.real_last_repay_time,p.redenvelope_rule_id,p.rate_coupon_rule_id,p.protocol_id, r.project_id,r.invest_id,r.old_project_id,r.original_project_id,r.deadline,r.rule_id,r.realize_amount,r.realize_interest from realize r left join project p on r.project_id = p.uuid where p.uuid = #{uuid}

select p.uuid from realize r inner join project p on r.project_id = p.uuid inner join project orp on r.old_project_id = orp.uuid
and p.last_repay_time <= #{nowTime} and orp.status in (9,91) and p.status in (8,87)
select count(p.uuid) from realize r left join project p on r.project_id = p.uuid where r.invest_id = #{investId} and p.status in (4,5,6,8,87,9,90,91)
